email-noti-text: When you’ re busy or not online, Substance can send you email notifications for any new direct messages or mentions of your name.
email-news-updates: From time to time, we’d like to send you emails with interesting news about Cuboid and your workspace. You can choose which of these updates you’d like to receive
deactivate-account-text: Don’t want to receive any emails or save my data on the job finder portal
